entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
